util.math
 

  • Uses of Point2D in util.math

    Subclasses of Point2D in util.math
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Point3D
    Point3D represents a point in 3D space, extending Point2D with a z-coordinate.
    Methods in util.math that return Point2D
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Point2D
    Point2D.normalize()
    Returns a normalized (unit length) version of this point as a vector.
    Point2D
    Point2D.scale(double factor)
    Returns a new Point2D that is the result of scaling this point by a factor.
    Point2D
    Point2D.subtract(Point2D other)
    Returns a new Point2D that is the result of subtracting another point from this point.
    Methods in util.math that return types with arguments of type Point2D
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Point2D>
    Polygon2D.getPoints()
    Returns the list of points (vertices) of the polygon.
    Methods in util.math with parameters of type Point2D
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    Point2D.distance(Point2D other)
    Calculates the Euclidean distance between this point and another point.
    Point2D
    Point2D.subtract(Point2D other)
    Returns a new Point2D that is the result of subtracting another point from this point.
